name: Car Road Driver
description:
Drive to get rid of the enemies!

Are you ready to drive to live? A breathtaking adventure starting with a scrap car. Whether you live in a desert, in an abandoned city, or on a cliff, drive to live! You have to make maneuvers to get rid of the enemy cars after him, or set them up and make them bump into obstacles.

BEST ACTION, CAR AND UPGRADE TYPES

C.R.D not only escapes enemy cars, but also allows you to unlock new cars with the money and reinforcements you collect. Is your vehicle strong enough? How about adding a weapon or reinforced armor? Identify the game type with 3 different camera angles. Whether first person, third person or top down. Which one do you want?

Become a STAR PLAYER
* Show that you are the best fighter in general leadership tables!

MAIN FEATURES
* Race cars, big feet, a giant truck and even a school bus at your disposal!
* Instant updated score table.
* With 3 different camera angles, you can determine the game type yourself.
* Reach the war truck immediately with the reward system.
* Drive through a deserted desert if you want with 5 different maps, or on the edge of a cliff.
* Optimization for Intel x86 mobile devices.
* Low poly vehicle and space designs.

GAME PLAYING
* Tapping control mode.
* Easy gameplay without the need for gas.

REQUIRED PERMISSIONS
* View Wi-Fi connections
To send player scores to the leader board server. (Google Play Services)
